# File lib/bundler/vendor/thor/base.rb, line 298
      def remove_task(*names)
        options = names.last.is_a?(Hash) ? names.pop : {}

        names.each do |name|
          tasks.delete(name.to_s)
          all_tasks.delete(name.to_s)
          undef_method name if options[:undefine]
        end
      end
